thread.title: Wall St posts biggest 1-day gain in 2-1/2 years

title: Wall St posts biggest 1-day gain in 2-1/2 years
text:
Wall St posts biggest 1-day gain in 2-1/2 years   01:15 
Wall Street's three major indexes jumped to their greatest one-day percentage gain in two-and-a-half years on Monday led by the tech sector. Fred Katayama reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Wall Street's three major indexes jumped to their greatest one-day percentage gain in two-and-a-half years on Monday led by the tech sector. Fred Katayama reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pIhJ1K
